octoteam.tahiti.quota

Class ThroughputLimiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • octoteam.tahiti.quota.QuotaLimiter
      • octoteam.tahiti.quota.ThroughputLimiter

  • public class ThroughputLimiter
extends QuotaLimiter
    基于吞吐率的限流器。获得令牌超过每秒的吞吐率阈值限制后，就停止提供服务.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThroughputLimiter(double QPS)
      根据传入数值设置吞吐率阈值.
      ThroughputLimiter(com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter limiter)
      根据 RateLimiter 对象创建限流器

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getQPS()
      获取预设的吞吐率阈值.
      boolean tryAcquire()
      尝试获取令牌 (判断是否到达阈值)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • tryAcquire

        public boolean tryAcquire()
        尝试获取令牌 (判断是否到达阈值)
        Specified by:
        tryAcquire in class QuotaLimiter
        Returns:
        如果未超出阈值返回 true，否则返回 false。
